import React, { useState } from 'react'; export default function Home() { const [customData, setCustomData] = useState(''); const [input, setInput] = useState(''); const [messages, setMessages] = useState([]); const sendCustomData = async () => { const response = await fetch('http://localhost:5000/api/custom-data', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify({ data: customData }) }); const data = await response.json(); alert(data.message); }; const sendMessage = async () => { const response = await fetch('http://localhost:5000/api/message', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify({ message: input }) }); const data = await response.json(); setMessages([...messages, { user: input, bot: data.message }]); setInput(''); }; return (
